Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. define: Use this api to generate first mile tracking number.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: firstmile.area_not_support
error_list.description: Area is invalid.Now we only support area in {area}.

error_list.name: firstmile.date_error
error_list.description: Parameter declare_date is wrong, should be later than or equal to today.

error_list.name: firstmile.date_format_error
error_list.description: Format for param date is wrong, should be like '2000-01-01'.

error_list.name: firstmile.max_number_limit
error_list.description: The first mile code number you apply is more than {num}.

error_list.name: firstmile.shipment_auth
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for the first mile shipment method: {method}.

error_list.name: firstmile.shipment_pre_declare_permission
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for first mile pre declare.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.
